alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong convective shower will impact portions of northeastern York and southwestern Cumberland Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong convective shower over Hollis, or 12 miles northeast of Alfred, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saco, Gorham, Buxton, Hollis, Waterboro, Scarborough, Standish, Limington and Dayton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York
